languages.text: {n}Арджента закрывает глаза и предается молитве:{/n} "О Император, смилуйся над несчастными, что оказались заперты в ловушке Архиврага, смилуйся, ибо они не знали, и им некуда было бежать..."

{n}Argenta closes her eyes and utters a prayer:{/n} "Emperor, have mercy on the unfortunate souls who found themselves trapped in the grasp of the Archenemy. Have mercy, for they knew nothing and had nowhere to go..."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента закрывает глаза и предается молитве:{/n} "О Император, смилуйся над несчастными, что оказались заперты в ловушке Архиврага, смилуйся, ибо они не знали, и им некуда было бежать..."

languages.text: {n}Argenta schließt ihre Augen und spricht ein Gebet:{/n} "Imperator erbarme dich der unglücklichen Seelen, die in den Fängen des Erzfeindes gefangen sind. Erbarme dich, denn sie wissen nichts und konnten nirgends hin ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta closes her eyes and utters a prayer:{/n} "Emperor, have mercy on the unfortunate souls who found themselves trapped in the grasp of the Archenemy. Have mercy, for they knew nothing and had nowhere to go..."

languages.text: {n}Argenta ferme les yeux et murmure une prière :{/n} « Empereur, ayez pitié des malheureuses âmes qui sont tombées entre les griffes du Grand Ennemi. Accordez-leur votre clémence, car elles ne savaient rien et n'avaient nulle part où aller... »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta closes her eyes and utters a prayer:{/n} "Emperor, have mercy on the unfortunate souls who found themselves trapped in the grasp of the Archenemy. Have mercy, for they knew nothing and had nowhere to go..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta ferme les yeux et murmure une prière :{/n} « Empereur, ayez pitié des malheureuses âmes qui sont tombées entre les griffes du Grand Ennemi. Accordez-leur votre clémence, car elles ne savaient rien et n'avaient nulle part où aller... »

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔闭上双眼，开始祈祷。{/n}“帝皇在上，请宽恕那些被混沌大敌掳走的灵魂吧。请您仁慈地对待他们，他们一无所知，无处可逃……”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta closes her eyes and utters a prayer:{/n} "Emperor, have mercy on the unfortunate souls who found themselves trapped in the grasp of the Archenemy. Have mercy, for they knew nothing and had nowhere to go..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔闭上双眼，开始祈祷。{/n}“帝皇在上，请宽恕那些被混沌大敌掳走的灵魂吧。请您仁慈地对待他们，他们一无所知，无处可逃……”

languages.text: {n}Argenta cierra los ojos y musita una oración:{/n} «Emperador, ten piedad de las desdichadas almas atrapadas en las garras del Archienemigo. Ten piedad, pues no sabían nada y no tenían adónde ir...».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta closes her eyes and utters a prayer:{/n} "Emperor, have mercy on the unfortunate souls who found themselves trapped in the grasp of the Archenemy. Have mercy, for they knew nothing and had nowhere to go..."

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは目を閉じて祈りを唱えた。{/n}「皇帝陛下よ、渾沌の勢力に囚われた不運な魂たちにお慈悲を。彼らは何も知らず、逃げ場もなかったのです。どうかお慈悲を…」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta closes her eyes and utters a prayer:{/n} "Emperor, have mercy on the unfortunate souls who found themselves trapped in the grasp of the Archenemy. Have mercy, for they knew nothing and had nowhere to go..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは目を閉じて祈りを唱えた。{/n}「皇帝陛下よ、渾沌の勢力に囚われた不運な魂たちにお慈悲を。彼らは何も知らず、逃げ場もなかったのです。どうかお慈悲を…」

languages.text: {n}Argenta, gözlerini kapatıp bir dua mırıldanıyor.{/n} "İmparator, Şerbaşı'nın pençesinde kapanı kısılmış talihsiz ruhlara merhamet et. Hiçbir şey bilmiyorlar, gidecek yerleri de yok. Merhametine muhtaçlar..."
